title: FOOD RECIPE APP
pitch: Are you tired of constantly wasting food because you're not sure what to make with the ingredients you have on hand? Say goodbye to food waste and hello to Foodie - your ultimate food app for using what you already have in your pantry!

title: PLANNER APP
pitch: A simple planner app that allows users to save events and tasks for the day or week.

title: QUIZ GAME
pitch: The quiz game comprises five questions centered around general knowledge.

title: WEATHER DASHBOARD
pitch: A comprehensive weather forecast application that displays both the current weather and a 5-day forecast.
